name: Curve BUSD Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Binance USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by Paxos.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Binance USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by Paxos.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Binance USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by Paxos.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool de fábrica contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y Binance USD, una moneda estable regulada emitida por Paxos.

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Binance USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by Paxos.

pt.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Binance USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by Paxos.

el.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Binance USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by Paxos.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu fabrika meta havuzu, 3Crv (DAI, USDC ve USDT) ve Paxos tarafından çıkarılan düzenlenmiş bir stabilcoin olan Binance USD'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Binance USD, a regulated stablecoin issued by Paxos.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。这个工厂池包含元池 3Crv (DAI, USDC, USDT) 和由 Paxos 发行而且受监管的 Binance USD。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में भी जमा कर सकते हैं। इस फ़ैक्टरी मेटापूल में 3Crv (DAI, USDC, और USDT) और Binance USD शामिल हैं, जो Paxos द्वारा जारी एक विनियमित स्थिर मुद्रा है।
